ext.description: An extension to work with 1C:Drive tests
config.localization.languageOverride.des: Language override for the extension UI (requires reloading the view). This does not apply to the settings page.
config.autoCollapseOnOpen.description: Automatically collapse 'NestedScenarios' ('ВложенныеСценарии') and 'ScenarioParameters' ('ПараметрыСценария') sections when opening a file.
config.stepsExternalUrl.description: URL to download steps.htm with Gherkin step definitions. Leave empty to use the file from the extension.
config.mailSettings.title: Test Mail Settings
config.emailPasswordInfo.description: The test mail password is stored in VS Code SecretStorage and is set via the Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P).
config.emailPasswordInfo.markdownDescrip:
**Test mail password**

The password is stored in VS Code SecretStorage and can be set via the Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P):
* [`1C:Drive - Set test mail password`](command:1cDriveHelper.setEmailPassword 'Click to set the password')
* [`1C:Drive - Clear test mail password`](command:1cDriveHelper.clearEmailPassword 'Click to remove the saved password')
config.assemblySettings.title: Test Assembly Settings
config.splitFeatureFiles.description: When assembling, save files attached to tests into a separate folder.
config.showOutputPanel.description: Automatically show the Output panel when starting test assembly.
config.pathsSettings.title: System Paths Settings
config.emptyInfobase.description: Path to the empty file-based infobase directory (EmptyInfobasePath).
config.buildPath.description: Path to the folder for assembled tests (BuildPath).
